name: Guessler
description:
A game initially made for Trijam 200 with the theme, "Expect the unexpected".

Play against a friend locally to compete to reach 50 points first. The catch is, neither of you know how to get points! It is up to you to figure that out during the match.

Choose between two maps, each with their own tasks and main objective:

  • Spinner Map - step on red buttons to activate spinners and push your opponent off the map to gain 10 points
  • Goals Map - score a goal on your opponent's net with the giant ball in the center to gain 10 points

If you'd like to play with a friend online, I recommend using Parsec, a free remote access tool.
